platform.name: BlockTix
platform.description: A decentralized event ticketing platform using blockchain technology
features: Blockchain-secured tickets prevent fraud and duplication
QR code-based entry system for events
Fair resale prevention through smart contracts

my_tickets.description: View purchased tickets and event history

faq.question: How do I buy tickets?
faq.answer: Browse events at the discover page, click on an event you like, select quantity, and complete payment. You must be logged in to purchase.

faq.question: Where are my tickets?
faq.answer: Your tickets are in your dashboard at your user dashboard section. You'll also receive them via email.

faq.question: How does blockchain security work?
faq.answer: Each ticket is a unique blockchain record that cannot be duplicated or forged, ensuring authenticity and preventing fraud.

faq.question: Can I resell my ticket?
faq.answer: Resale policies are set by event organizers. BlockTix uses smart contracts to prevent scalping and ensure fair pricing.

faq.question: What if I forgot my password?
faq.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, check your email for verification, and follow the reset instructions.

faq.question: My payment failed, what should I do?
faq.answer: Verify your card details, check sufficient funds, try a different payment method, or clear your browser cache. Contact support if the issue persists.

faq.question: I didn't receive my ticket
faq.answer: Check your email and spam folder. Log in to your user dashboard to view your tickets. If still missing, contact support with your order details.

faq.question: How do I use my QR code?
faq.answer: Open your ticket from your user dashboard or email, and present the QR code at the venue entrance for scanning.

faq.question: How do I login?
faq.answer: Click the 'Login' button at the top right of the page or go to the login page to sign in to your account.

payment_issues: Contact support with your order ID
qr_code_issues: Log in and go to My Tickets
Hold phone steady at entry point
